record.title: JOBS TRAINING PROGRAM
record.narrative:
JOBS TRAINING PROGRAM -- (House of Representatives - January 28, 2008)

[Page: H460]
(Mr. DAVIS of Illinois asked and was given permission to address the House for 1 minute and to revise and extend his remarks.)

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I know we are going to be looking at economic stimulus packages, and we are going to be trying to jump-start and help our economy. It is my belief that one way that we can do that is to make sure that we provide a jobs training program for the 1 million young people across the country who don't have any money, no job, no employment, many of them are out of school.
Let's consider a job training program for our young people as a part of the economic stimulus package.
